body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.57"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1262966082"/> <code code="67500-9" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Airbag deployment"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation>
